name: Appointment of Shri Annappa E, IPS (WB:2005) as DIG, CRPF

details.Event Description: Appointment of Shri Annappa E, IPS (WB:2005) as Deputy Inspector General in Central Reserve Police Force (CRPF) on deputation basis for a period of five years.

name: Appointment of Shri N. N. Tripathi, IPS (WB:2009) as DIG, CISF

details.assignment: Deputy Inspector General in Central Industrial Security Force (CISF)
details.duration: for a period of five years from the date of assumption of the charge of the post or until further orders, whichever is earlier
details.relief_requested: Shri N. N. Tripathi, IPS (WB:2009) may be relieved immediately to enable him to take up his new assignment at the Centre.
